content.question: Using the 1928 image, answer (a), (b), and (c). a) Briefly describe ONE perspective about women’s roles during the 1920s expressed through the image. b) Briefly explain ONE specific historical development or circumstance from 1900 to 1929 that led to changes in women’s roles during the 1920s such as that depicted in the image. c) Briefly explain ONE specific historical development in business OR culture that led to the creation and use of images such as the one above during the 1920s.

frqParts.text: Using the 1928 image, answer (a), (b), and (c). a) Briefly describe ONE perspective about women’s roles during the 1920s expressed through the image. b) Briefly explain ONE specific historical development or circumstance from 1900 to 1929 that led to changes in women’s roles during the 1920s such as that depicted in the image. c) Briefly explain ONE specific historical development in business OR culture that led to the creation and use of images such as the one above during the 1920s.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
